subject: Doping (Sports)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: The Italian cycling federation called for doping bans to be extended to four years from two and wants team directors and other squad members barred indefinitely for first offenses.
snippet: The Italian cycling federation called for doping bans to be extended to four years from two and wants team directors and other squad members barred indefinitely for first offenses.
